alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Hertford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:54PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bertie and south central Hertford Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 754 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lewiston Woodville, or 10 miles south of Rich Square, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rain could result in localized ponding of water on roadways. Locations impacted include... Windsor, Aulander, Lewiston Woodville, Powellsville, Roxobel, Kelford, Askewville, Earleys, Connaritsa, Republican, Burden, Millennium, Proctors Corner and Buena Vista. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
